channel.title: Halp!
channel.description:
Ohk, I'm on Linux, and Kopete only shows like .1% of my contact list. I thought it might of only shown online users, so I logged on Windows, and all my friends were online, logged on Kopete in Linux, and they didn't appear online..
So I'll ask my questions at once.
What's a good MSN client? How do you run shell scripts? Is there a way to access my Windows drive from Linux? I need to get some files off it, but don't have an Cd-R's nor flash drive etc.
That should be it, thanks in advance.

item.title: Halp!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:124121”]How do you get GAIM?
It’s called Pidgin, and, It’s only for;
Windows
Source
Fedora Core
CentOS / RHEL.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 04:29:54 AM[/size][hr]And, it’s weird, I run it, like place the script on my desktop, then type:
chmod +x desktop`
Then it drops down like

So I type in ./install-flashplayer.sh
And it drops down like

again :([/quote]

Use this: K > Add/Remove Programs. (Or something similar.)

Read full topic

item.title: Halp!
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

gaim
terminal(xterm, aterm, konsole to name a few), then chmod +x thefile.sh, then ./thefile.sh
ntfsutils, not sure though

Read full topic
